Dr. Madhukar Doria Receiving award from Dr. Chung-won- Choue (GCS President ) at Korea.

Dr. Madhukar Doria is seen with Dr. Chung-won- Choue (GCS President ) at Korea.

International Delegates at GCS International Convention.

Dr. S.S Mohapatra MP and President GCS India is seen with R. Venkat Raman (President of India), Dr. Madhukar Doria, Dr. C.S Nanda at GCS International Convention at New Delhi

Dr. S.S Mohapatra MP and President GCS India is seen the Governor of Rajasthan and Dr. Madhukar Doria at Jaipur

Dr. Young Seek Choue is seen with Mr. Sarat Kar, Speaker of Odisha Government and Dr. Hong-Ki-Kim and Dr. Jyoti Mohapatra amongst others at Odisha.

Dr. Jyoti Mohapatra , National Coordinator GCS is seen with Dr. Young Seek Choue, President, GCS international, Korea.

Dr. Young-Seek-Choue President CS International Korea is seen with S.D Sharma, President of India, Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS international India and other Dignitaries

Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS international India is seen with Dr. Jae sikh Sohn Unification minister of Govt. of South Korea.

Dr. Young-Seek-Choue, President GCS International Korea is seen with R.Venkat Raman, President of India Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS international India

Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS internatioal India is seen with Dr. Young-Seek-Choue, President GCS International, Korea and Dr. Woon-Sung-Choi, Ambassador to South Korea to India

Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS international India is seek with Gloria Maka Pagal Arroyo, President of Philippines and other dignitaries at Manila.

Dr. Young- Seek- Choue, President of GCS International, Korea is seen with leaders of Odisha.

Dr. S.S Mohaptra, MP and President of GCS international India Briefing S.D Sharma, President of India about GCS International.
